entry.title: Run TypeScript in VS Code
entry.summary:
To run TypeScript file in VS Code, you have to

  1. Install the extension Code Runner
  2. Install modules locally:
  3. typescript: npm install --save-dev typescript
  4. typescript-tools: npm install --save-dev typescript-tools

Now, you can run .ts file in VS Code
